name: Hazmat Safety Training
description: Mastering the use of hazardous materials (HazMat) protective gear, contamination control, and exposure response.

cards.title: Proper Use of PPE in BioChem Environments
cards.description: Training in the correct donning, doffing, and maintenance of protective gear in hazardous environments.
cards.bulletpoints: Hazmat suit layers, glove sealing, respirator fitting
cards.summaryText: Drill clean donning and doffing sequences, seal gloves and respirators, and inspect gear so breaches never happen inside the hot zone.

cards.title: Decontamination Protocols for BioChem Exposure
cards.description: Step-by-step procedures to remove and neutralize biohazards from personnel and equipment.
cards.bulletpoints: Chemical neutralization, UV sterilization, containment zone decon
cards.summaryText: Move through decon corridors with neutralizers, UV, and rinse cycles so contaminants are stripped before anyone re-enters cold zones.

cards.title: Emergency Response to BioChem Exposure
cards.description: Rapid response strategies for treating exposure to biological and chemical agents.
cards.bulletpoints: Neutralization agents, emergency isolation, first aid for chemical burns
cards.summaryText: Deploy neutralizers, isolate casualties, and stabilize injuries on the spot to stop BioChem exposures from escalating.
